details.title: Mental Health Awareness App
details.description: Developed an app using the MERN stack and Expo. Main features included: users and user management, user data synchronized with database, functional user inferface, integration with Tumblr API, AI based recommendation system with Tensorflow.js

details.title: Battle Ship
details.description: Took over, refactored, and cleaned up an existing implementation of BattleShip. Converted the user interface to a GUI from CLI. Added graphics using PyGame. Implemented additional functionality building on the previous version.

details.title: Containerization of iOS Apps
details.description: Worked on sand-boxing of enterprise applications (containerization) which enable them to be installed on employee's iOS devices without worrying about security issues. Implemented wrapping of library function calls using swizzling, objective-c backend, linker flags and dynamic library injection.

details.title: Sandboxed Browser App
details.description: Built a demo browser application for iOS. Containerized the app using the custom script, so that it only works for certain urls.
